00064 class MainTabWidget(QTabWidget):
00065         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00066                 QTabWidget.__init__(self, parent)
00067                 self.pressedAt = -1
00068 
00069         def mousePressEvent(self, event):
00070                 if event.button() == Qt.MidButton:
00071                         self.pressedAt = self.tabBar().tabAt( event.pos() )
00072         
00073         def mouseReleaseEvent(self, event):
00074                 if event.button() == Qt.MidButton:
00075                         tab = self.tabBar().tabAt( event.pos() )
00076                         if tab != self.pressedAt:
00077                                 self.pressedAt = -1
00078                                 return
00079                         self.emit(SIGNAL('middleClicked(int)'), tab)
00080 
00081         def wheelEvent(self, event):
00082                 if not self.tabBar().underMouse():
00083                         return 
00084                 degrees = event.delta() / 8
00085                 steps = degrees / 15
00086                 self.setCurrentIndex( ( self.currentIndex() + steps ) % self.count() )
00087

00151                 # These actions are not handled by the Main Window but by the currently opened tab.
00152                 # What we do here, is connect all these actions to a single handler that will
00153                 # call the current child/tab/form. This is handled this way instead of signals because we
00154                 # may have several windows opened at the same time and all children would receive
00155                 # the signal...
00156                 self.actions = [ 'New', 'Save', 'Delete', 'Find', 'Previous', 'Next', 
00157                         'Reload', 'Switch', 'Attach', 'Export', 'Import', 'GoToResourceId', 
00158                         'Duplicate', 'AccessLog', 'MassiveUpdate' ]
00159                 for x in self.actions:
00160                         action = eval('self.action'+ x)
00161                         self.connect( action, SIGNAL( 'triggered()' ), self.callChildView )
00162

00165                 self.pushSwitchView.setPopupMode( QToolButton.MenuButtonPopup )
00166 
00167                 self.updateEnabledActions()
00168 
00169                 self.shortcutActions = []
00170                 self.shortcutsGroup = None
00171 
00172                 # Stores the id of the menu action. This is to avoid opening two menus
00173                 # when 'action_id' returns the same as 'menu_id'
00174                 self.menuId = False
00175 
00176                 # Update the number of pending requests in the status bar using a timer but also
00177                 # subscribing to model changes if 'koo' module is installed in the server.
00178                 self.requestsTimer = QTimer()
00179                 self.connect( self.requestsTimer, SIGNAL('timeout()'), self.updateRequestsStatus )
00180                 self.pendingRequests = -1 
00181                 # Subscriber will be used to update requests status too. Only if 'koo' model is installed
00182                 # on the server.
00183                 self.subscriber = None
00184

00187                 self.actionOpenPartnersTab.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/partner.png' ) )

00193                 self.actionOpenProductsTab.setText( _('Open products tab') )

00210                 self.systemTrayIcon.setContextMenu( self.systemTrayMenu )
00211                 self.connect( self.systemTrayIcon, SIGNAL('activated(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason)'), self.systemTrayIconActivated )

00213         def systemTrayIconActivated(self, reason):
00214                 if reason != QSystemTrayIcon.DoubleClick:
00215                         return
00216                 self.setVisible( not self.isVisible() )
00217                 if self.isMinimized():
00218                         self.showNormal()
00219 
00220         def openPartnersTab(self):
00221                 if not self.isVisible():
00222                         self.showNormal()
00223                 Api.instance.createWindow(None, 'res.partner', mode='tree')
00224 
00225         def openProductsTab(self):
00226                 if not self.isVisible():
00227                         self.showNormal()
00228 
00229                 model = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.model', 'search', [('model','=','product.product')], Rpc.session.context )
00230                 if not model:
00231                         QMessageBox.information(self, _('Products'), _('Products module is not installed.') )
00232                         return
00233 
00234                 Api.instance.createWindow(None, 'product.product', mode='tree')
00235                         
00236 
00237         def startRequestsTimer(self):
00238                 # Every X minutes check for new requests and put the number of open
00239                 # requests in the appropiate space in the status bar
00240                 self.requestsTimer.start( Options.options.get( 'requests_refresh_interval', 5 * 60 ) * 1000 )
00241                 # We always use the Subscriber as the class itself will handle
00242                 # whether the module exists on the server or not
00243                 self.subscriber = Rpc.Subscriber(Rpc.session, self)
00244                 # Subscribe to changes to res.request (if 'koo' module is installed in the server).
00245                 self.subscriber.subscribe( 'updated_model:res.request', self.updateRequestsStatus )
00246 
00247         def stopRequestsTimer(self):
00248                 self.requestsTimer.stop()
00249                 if self.subscriber:
00250                         self.subscriber.unsubscribe()
00251                         self.subscriber = None
00252 
00253         def formDesigner(self):
00254                 dialog = FormDesigner(self)
00255                 dialog.show()
00256 
00257         ## @brief Closes the given tab smartly.
00258         #
00259         # First asks the widget in the tab if it can be closed and if so, it removes it.
00260         # Note that the widget might ask the user some questions, for example when there's
00261         # modified data in a form.
00262         # It returns True if all tabs could be closed, False otherwise. If there are no 
00263         # tabs always returns True.
00264         def closeTab(self, tab):
00265                 widget = self.tabWidget.widget(tab)
00266                 if widget:
00267                         # Ask the current tab if it can be closed
00268                         if not widget.canClose():
00269                                 return False
00270                 self.tabWidget.removeTab( tab ) 
00271                 widget.setParent( None )
00272                 del widget
00273                 self.updateEnabledActions()
00274                 return True
00275 
00276         ## @brief Closes the current tab smartly. 
00277         def closeCurrentTab(self):
00278                 return self.closeTab( self.tabWidget.currentIndex() )
00279 
00280         def fullTextSearch(self):
00281                 # Ensure the window is shown as it might be called from the system tray icon
00282                 # If we don't do this the dialog is shown, but when it's closed the whole
00283                 # application is closed too.
00284                 if not self.isVisible():
00285                         self.showNormal()
00286 
00287                 win = FullTextSearchDialog(self)
00288                 if win.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00289                         return
00290                 self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00291                 res = win.result
00292                 Api.instance.createWindow(None, res[1], res[0], view_type='form', mode='form,tree')
00293                 self.unsetCursor()
00294 
00295         def nextTab(self):
00296                 pn = self.tabWidget.currentIndex()
00297                 if pn == self.tabWidget.count() - 1:
00298                         pn = 0
00299                 else:
00300                         pn = pn + 1
00301                 self.tabWidget.setCurrentIndex( pn )
00302 
00303         def previousTab(self):
00304                 pn = self.tabWidget.currentIndex()
00305                 if pn == 0:
00306                         pn = self.tabWidget.count() - 1
00307                 else:
00308                         pn = pn - 1
00309                 self.tabWidget.setCurrentIndex( pn )
00310 
00311         def userPreferences(self):
00312                 win = PreferencesDialog(self)
00313                 win.exec_()
00314 
00315         def newRequest(self):
00316                 if not self.isVisible():
00317                         self.showNormal()
00318                 Api.instance.createWindow(None, 'res.request', False, 
00319                         [('act_from','=',Rpc.session.uid)], 'form', mode='form,tree')
00320 
00321         ## Opens a new tab with requests pending for the user to resolve
00322         def pendingRequests(self):
00323                 if not self.isVisible():
00324                         self.showNormal()
00325                 Api.instance.createWindow(False, 'res.request', False, 
00326                         [('act_to','=',Rpc.session.uid)], 'form', mode='tree,form')
00327 
00328         ## Opens a new tab with all unsolved requests posted by the user
00329         def waitingRequests(self):
00330                 if not self.isVisible():
00331                         self.showNormal()
00332                 Api.instance.createWindow(False, 'res.request', False, 
00333                         [('act_from','=',Rpc.session.uid), ('state','=','waiting')], 'form', mode='tree,form')
00334 
00335         ## Updates the status bar with the number of pending requests.
00336         #
00337         #  Note that this function uses Rpc.session.call() so exceptions are ignored, because this
00338         #  function is called every five minutes. We don't want any temporary disconnection of the
00339         #  server to annoy the user unnecessarily.
00340         def updateRequestsStatus(self):
00341                 # We use 'try' because we might not have logged in or the server might
00342                 # be down temporarily. This way the user isn't notified unnecessarily.
00343                 try:
00344                         uid = Rpc.session.uid
00345                         ids,ids2 = Rpc.session.call('/object', 'execute', 'res.request', 'request_get')
00346                         if len(ids):
00347                                 message = _('%s request(s)') % len(ids)
00348                         else:
00349                                 message = _('No request')
00350                         if len(ids2):
00351                                 message += _(' - %s pending request(s)') % len(ids2)
00352                         self.uiRequests.setText( message )
00353                         self.systemTrayIcon.setToolTip( message )
00354                         if self.pendingRequests != -1 and self.pendingRequests < len(ids):
00355                                 QApplication.alert( self )
00356                                 if self.systemTrayIcon.isVisible() and not self.isVisible():
00357                                         self.systemTrayIcon.showMessage( _("New Request"), _("You've received a new request") )
00358                         self.pendingRequests = len(ids)
00359                         return (ids, ids2)
00360                 except:
00361                         return ([], [])
00362 
00363         def showLoginDialog(self):
00364                 LoginDialog.defaultHost = Options.options['login.server']
00365                 LoginDialog.defaultPort = Options.options['login.port']
00366                 LoginDialog.defaultProtocol = Options.options['login.protocol']
00367                 LoginDialog.defaultUserName = Options.options['login.login']
00368                 dialog = LoginDialog( self )
00369                 while dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
00370                         self.login( dialog.url, dialog.databaseName )
00371                         if Rpc.session.open:
00372                                 return
00373 
00374         ## Logs into the specified database and server.
00375         #
00376         # If correctly logged in, the parameters are stored as the default
00377         # config for the next time. Note that the function first will check
00378         # if it can close all opened tabs. If the user permits so by storing
00379         # or discarding all modified tabs, then it logs in. If no tabs are
00380         # opened or non of them have been modified, then no questions are asked.
00381         # @param url string describing the server
00382         # @param databaseName name of the database to log into
00383         def login(self, url, databaseName):
00384                 # Before connecting to the specified database
00385                 # try to logout from the previous one. That will allow the
00386                 # user to cancel the operation if any of the tabs is modified
00387                 # and it will stop requests timer and subscription.
00388                 if not self.logout():
00389                         return
00390                 try:
00391                         log_response = Rpc.session.login(url, databaseName)
00392                         url = QUrl( url )
00393                         if log_response==Rpc.session.LoggedIn:
00394                                 Options.options.loadSettings()
00395 
00396                                 iconVisible = Options.options.get( 'show_system_tray_icon', True )
00397                                 self.systemTrayIcon.setVisible( iconVisible )
00398 
00399                                 # Start timer once settings have been loaded because
00400                                 # the request interval can be configured
00401                                 self.startRequestsTimer()
00402                                 # Remove password and store URL
00403                                 url.setPassword( '' )
00404                                 Options.options['login.url'] = unicode( url.toString() )
00405                                 Options.options['login.db'] = databaseName
00406                                 Options.options.save()
00407                                 self.openMenuTab()
00408                                 self.openHomeTab()
00409 
00410                                 self.updateRequestsStatus()
00411                                 self.updateUserShortcuts()
00412 
00413                         elif log_response==Rpc.session.Exception:
00414                                 QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Connection error !'), _('Unable to connect to the server !')) 
00415                         elif log_response==Rpc.session.InvalidCredentials:
00416                                 QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Connection error !'), _('Bad username or password !'))
00417 
00418                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00419                         (e1,e2) = e
00420                         Common.error(_('Connection Error !'),e1,e2)
00421                         Rpc.session.logout()
00422 
00423 
00424         ## Closes all tabs smartly, that is using closeCurrentTab()
00425         def closeAllTabs(self):
00426                 while self.tabWidget.count() > 0:
00427                         if not self.closeCurrentTab():
00428                                 return False
00429                 return True
00430 
00431         def logout(self):
00432                 if not self.closeAllTabs():
00433                         return False
00434                 self.uiRequests.clear()
00435                 self.stopRequestsTimer()
00436                 self.uiUserName.setText( _('Not logged !') )
00437                 self.uiServerInformation.setText( _('Press Ctrl+O to login') )
00438                 self.setWindowTitle( self.fixedWindowTitle )
00439                 Rpc.session.logout()
00440                 self.updateEnabledActions()
00441                 self.updateUserShortcuts()
00442                 return True
00443

00445                 QDesktopServices.openUrl( QUrl('http://doc.openerp.com') )
00446

00460                 dialog.exec_()

00462         def showShortcuts(self):

00464                 loadUi( Common.uiPath('shortcuts.ui'), dialog )
00465                 dialog.exec_()
00466 
00467         def shortcutsChanged(self, model):
00468                 if model == 'ir.ui.menu':
00469                         self.updateUserShortcuts()
00470 
00471         def updateUserShortcuts(self):
00472                 # Remove previous actions
00473                 for action in self.shortcutActions:
00474                         self.menuWindow.removeAction( action )
00475                 self.shortcutActions = []
00476 
00477                 if not Rpc.session.logged():
00478                         return
00479                 fields = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.ui.view_sc', 'fields_get', ['res_id', 'name'])
00480                 self.shortcutsGroup = RecordGroup( 'ir.ui.view_sc', fields )
00481                 self.shortcutsGroup.setDomain( [('user_id','=',Rpc.session.uid), ('resource','=','ir.ui.menu')] )
00482                 self.shortcutActions.append( self.menuWindow.addSeparator() )
00483                 for record in self.shortcutsGroup:
00484                         action = QAction( self )
00485                         action.setObjectName( str( record.id ) )
00486                         action.setText( record.value('name') )
00487                         action.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/relate.png' ) )
00488                         self.connect( action, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.executeShortcut )
00489                         self.menuWindow.addAction( action )
00490                         self.shortcutActions.append( action )
00491 
00492         def executeShortcut(self):
00493                 action = self.sender()
00494                 id = int( action.objectName() )
00495                 # We need to get the value as if we were the server because we
00496                 # don't want the string that would be shown for the many2one field
00497                 # but the id.
00498                 m = self.shortcutsGroup[ id ]
00499                 id = self.shortcutsGroup.fieldObjects[ 'res_id' ].get( m )
00500                 Api.instance.executeKeyword('tree_but_open', {'model':'ir.ui.menu', 'id':id, 'ids': [id]})
00501 
00502         ## @brief Opens the Menu Tab.
00503         #
00504         # If a tab menu already exists it's risen, otherwise a new one is created
00505         # and rised.
00506         def openMenuTab(self):
00507 
00508                 # Ensure the window is shown as it might be called from the system tray icon
00509                 if not self.isVisible():
00510                         self.showNormal()
00511 
00512                 # Search if a menu tab already exists and rise it
00513                 for p in range(self.tabWidget.count()):
00514                         if self.tabWidget.widget(p).model=='ir.ui.menu':
00515                                 self.tabWidget.setCurrentIndex(p)
00516                                 return 
00517 
00518                 # If no menu tab exists query the server and open it
00519                 id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'res.users', 'read', [Rpc.session.uid], [ 'menu_id','name'], Rpc.session.context)
00520                 self.uiUserName.setText( id[0]['name'] or '' )
00521                 self.uiServerInformation.setText( "%s [%s]" % (Rpc.session.url, Rpc.session.databaseName) )
00522                 self.setWindowTitle( self.fixedWindowTitle + " - [%s]" % Rpc.session.databaseName )
00523 
00524                 # Store the menuId so we ensure we don't open the menu twice when
00525                 # calling openHomeTab()
00526                 self.menuId = id[0]['menu_id'][0]
00527 
00528                 if not id[0]['menu_id']:
00529                         QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Access denied'), _('You can not log into the system !\nAsk the administrator to verify\nyou have an action defined for your user.') )
00530                         Rpc.session.logout()
00531                         return 
00532 
00533                 Api.instance.execute(self.menuId, {'window':self })
00534 
00535 
00536         ## @brief Opens Home Tab.
00537         #
00538         # Home tab is an action specified in the server which usually is a 
00539         # dashboard, but could be anything.
00540         def openHomeTab(self):
00541                 id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'res.users', 'read', [Rpc.session.uid], [ 'action_id','name'], Rpc.session.context)
00542 
00543                 if not id[0]['action_id']:
00544                         return 
00545                 id = id[0]['action_id'][0]
00546                 if not id:
00547                         return
00548 
00549                 # Do not open the action if the id is the same as the menu id.
00550                 if id == self.menuId:
00551                         return
00552                 Api.instance.execute(id, {'window':self })
00553 
00554         def clearCache(self):
00555                 ViewSettings.ViewSettings.clear()
00556                 if Rpc.session.cache:
00557                         Rpc.session.cache.clear()

00559         def closeEvent(self, event):
00560                 if QMessageBox.question(self, _("Quit"), _("Do you really want to quit ?"), _("Yes"), _("No")) == 1:
00561                         event.ignore()  
00562                         return
00563                 wid = self.tabWidget.currentWidget()
00564                 if wid:
00565                         # Ask the current tab if it can be closed
00566                         if not wid.canClose():
00567                                 event.ignore()
00568                                 return
00569                 self.systemTrayIcon.setVisible( False )
00570 
00571         def closeTabForced(self):
00572                 idx = self.tabWidget.indexOf( self.sender() )
00573                 self.tabWidget.removeTab( idx ) 
00574                 self.updateEnabledActions()
00575                 #del self.sender()
00576 
00577         def addWindow(self, win, target):
00578                 if target == 'current':
00579                         self.connect( win, SIGNAL('closed()'), self.closeTabForced )
00580                         self.connect( win, SIGNAL('shortcutsChanged'), self.shortcutsChanged )
00581                         self.tabWidget.addTab( win, win.name )
00582                         # If shift key is pressed do not show the added tab
00583                         if not (QApplication.keyboardModifiers() & Qt.ShiftModifier):
00584                                 self.tabWidget.setCurrentIndex( self.tabWidget.count()-1 )
00585                 else:
00586                         dialog = QDialog( self )        
00587                         layout = QHBoxLayout(dialog)
00588                         layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00589                         layout.addWidget( win )
00590                         win.setParent( dialog )
00591                         self.connect( win, SIGNAL('closed()'), dialog.accept )
00592                         win.show()
00593                         dialog.show()
00594 
00595         def updateEnabledActions(self):
00596                 view = self.tabWidget.currentWidget()
00597                 for x in self.actions:
00598                         action = eval( 'self.action' + x )
00599                         if view and x in view.handlers:
00600                                 action.setEnabled( True )
00601                         else:
00602                                 action.setEnabled( False )
00603 
00604                 if Rpc.session.open:
00605                         self.actionFullTextSearch.setEnabled( True )
00606                 else:
00607                         self.actionFullTextSearch.setEnabled( False )
00608 
00609                 if Options.options.get( 'allow_massive_updates', True ):
00610                         self.actionMassiveUpdate.setVisible( True )
00611                 else:
00612                         self.actionMassiveUpdate.setVisible( False )
00613 
00614                 # Update the 'Reports', 'Actions' and 'Browse' Menu entries
00615                 self.menuReports.clear()
00616                 self.menuBrowse.clear()
00617                 self.menuActions.clear()
00618                 self.menuPlugins.clear()
00619                 reports = False
00620                 browse = False
00621                 actions = False
00622                 plugins = False
00623                 if view:
00624                         self.pushSwitchView.setMenu( view.switchViewMenu() )
00625                         for x in view.actions():
00626                                 if x.type() == 'print':
00627                                         self.menuReports.addAction( x )
00628                                         reports = True
00629                                 elif x.type() == 'relate':
00630                                         self.menuBrowse.addAction( x )
00631                                         browse = True
00632                                 elif x.type() == 'action':
00633                                         self.menuActions.addAction( x ) 
00634                                         actions = True
00635                                 else: # Should be 'plugin'
00636                                         self.menuPlugins.addAction( x )
00637                                         plugins = True
00638                         
00639                 self.menuReports.setEnabled( reports )
00640                 self.menuBrowse.setEnabled( browse )
00641                 self.menuActions.setEnabled( actions )
00642                 self.menuPlugins.setEnabled( plugins )
00643 
00644                 value = Rpc.session.logged()
00645                 self.actionOpenMenuTab.setEnabled( value )
00646                 self.actionOpenHomeTab.setEnabled( value )
00647                 self.actionPreferences.setEnabled( value )
00648                 self.actionClearCache.setEnabled( value )
00649                 self.actionSendRequest.setEnabled( value )
00650                 self.actionReadMyRequest.setEnabled( value )
00651                 self.actionWaitingRequests.setEnabled( value )
00652                 self.actionDisconnect.setEnabled( value )
00653 
00654                 if self.tabWidget.count() > 0:
00655                         value = True
00656                 else:
00657                         value = False
00658                 self.actionClose.setEnabled( value )
00659                 self.actionNextTab.setEnabled( value )
00660                 self.actionPreviousTab.setEnabled( value )

00663         def callChildView( self ):
00664                 o = self.sender()
00665                 action = str( o.objectName() ).replace('action','')
00666                 wid = self.tabWidget.currentWidget()
00667                 if wid:
00668                         res = True
00669                         if action in wid.handlers:
00670                                 res = wid.handlers[action]()

00672         def currentChanged( self, page ): 
00673                 self.updateEnabledActions()

00675         def createDatabase(self):
00676                 result = {}
00677                 dialog = DatabaseCreationDialog(self)
00678                 ret = dialog.exec_()
00679                 if ret == QDialog.Accepted:
00680                         self.login( dialog.url, dialog.databaseName )

00682         def dropDatabase(self):
00683                 dialog = DatabaseDialog( DatabaseDialog.TypeSelect, _('Delete a database'), self )
00684                 r = dialog.exec_()
00685 
00686                 if r == QDialog.Rejected:
00687                         return
00688                 try:
00689                         self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00690                         Rpc.database.call(dialog.url, 'drop', dialog.password, dialog.databaseName )
00691                         self.unsetCursor()
00692                         QMessageBox.information( self, _('Database removal'), _('Database dropped successfully!') )
00693                 except Exception, e:
00694                         self.unsetCursor()
00695                         if e.message=='AccessDenied:None':
00696                                 QMessageBox.warning( self, _("Could not drop database."), _('Bad database administrator password !') )
00697                         else:
00698                                 QMessageBox.warning( self, _("Database removal"), _("Couldn't drop database") )
00699 
00700         def restoreDatabase(self):
00701                 fileName = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, 'Open backup file...')
00702                 if fileName.isNull():
00703                         return
00704                 dialog = DatabaseDialog( DatabaseDialog.TypeEdit, _('Delete a database'), self )
00705                 r = dialog.exec_()
00706                 if r == QDialog.Rejected:
00707                         return
00708                 try:
00709                         self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00710                         f = file(fileName, 'rb')
00711                         data = base64.encodestring(f.read())
00712                         f.close()
00713                         Rpc.database.call(dialog.url, 'restore', dialog.password, dialog.databaseName, data)
00714                         self.unsetCursor()
00715                         QMessageBox.information( self, '', _('Database restored successfully!') )
00716                 except Exception,e:
00717                         self.unsetCursor()
00718                         if e.message=='AccessDenied:None':
00719                                 QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Could not restore database'), _('Bad database administrator password!') )
00720                         else:
00721                                 QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Could not restore database'), _('There was an error restoring the database!') )
00722 
00723         def backupDatabase(self):
00724                 dialog = DatabaseDialog( DatabaseDialog.TypeSelect, _('Backup a database'), self )
00725                 r = dialog.exec_()
00726                 if r == QDialog.Rejected:
00727                         return
00728                 fileName = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self, 'Save as...')
00729                 if fileName.isNull():
00730                         return
00731                 try:
00732                         self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00733                         dump_b64 = Rpc.database.execute(dialog.url, 'dump', dialog.password, dialog.databaseName)
00734                         dump = base64.decodestring(dump_b64)
00735                         f = file(fileName, 'wb')
00736                         f.write(dump)
00737                         f.close()
00738                         self.unsetCursor()
00739                         QMessageBox.information( self, '', _("Database backuped successfully!"))
00740                 except Exception, e:
00741                         self.unsetCursor()
00742                         QMessageBox.warning( self, '', _('Could not backup database.\n%s') % (str(e)) )
00743 
00744         def changeAdministratorPassword(self):
00745                 dialog = AdministratorPasswordDialog( self )
00746                 dialog.exec_()
